title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A reunion with a past acquaintance requires more patience and adjustment than you initially expect. Although it would be ideal to pick up where you left off with an old friend, this might not be possible. You are different people than you were before. Its best to discover who you are now and draw on your history as a reservoir from which to savor joint memories. You may find that your recollections arent the same, but the details are of little significance. A rekindled connection warms both your hearts. Poet Khalil Gibran wrote, Let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the spirit. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
